subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Bears released the veteran strong safety Adam Archuleta, ending a brief and disappointing tenure with the team. Archuleta, 30, broke a hand early last season and started in only 10 of the 15 games in which he appeared. He finished the season on special teams.
